.. rst-class:: phpdoctorst

.. role:: php(code)
	:language: php


CSSDirective
============


.. php:namespace:: ILab\Stem\External\Blade\Directives

.. php:class:: CSSDirective


	.. rst-class:: phpdoc-description
	
		| Class CSSDirective\.
		
		| Adds an \`@css\(\'name\-of\-stylesheet\.css\'\)\` directive to Blade templates that outputs the URL to a stylesheet in the
		| theme\'s public/css directory\.  If you want to enqueue the stylesheet, use the \`@enqueue\` directive\.
		| 
		| Usage:
		| 
		| \`\`\`
		
	
	:Parent:
		:php:class:`ILab\\Stem\\Core\\ViewDirective`

-------

.. rst-class:: public

	.. php:method:: public execute( $args)
